name: SpursFastBreak-PresentedbyProjectSpurscom
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Spurs Fast Break is a new audio feature we’re adding to Project Spurs. Its purpose will be to deliver the latest San Antonio Spurs News in quick 4-5 minute episodes several times per week between episodes of the Spurscast.

Aside from talking about the latest news, we’ll also have quick recaps and game previews and feature excerpts from full episodes of the Spurscast.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
